name: AWS LoadBalancer to NACL direct relationship

statements.__comment: Cleanup: Remove all previous PROTECTS relationships between NACLs and LBs
Create: PROTECTS relationships via subnet traversal
statements.query: MATCH (lb:AWSLoadBalancerV2)-[:SUBNET]->(subnet:EC2Subnet)<-[:PART_OF_SUBNET]-(nacl:EC2NetworkAcl) MERGE (nacl)-[r:PROTECTS]->(lb) SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG, r.via_subnet = subnet.subnetid
